verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G1859>feast<s%> of <S%G106>unleavened<s%> bread drew <S%G1448>near,<s%> which is <S%G3004>called<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover.<s%>
And the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> they might <S%G337>kill<s%> him; for they <S%G5399>feared<s%> the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G1941>surnamed<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> of the <S%G706>number<s%> of the <S%G1427>twelve.<s%>
And he <S%G565>went<s%> his way, and <S%G4814>communed<s%> with the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G4755>captains,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he might <S%G3860>betray<s%> him to them.
And they were <S%G5463>glad,<s%> and <S%G4934>covenanted<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> him <S%G694>money.<s%>
And he <S%G1843>promised,<s%> and <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G2120>opportunity<s%> to <S%G3860>betray<s%> him to them in the <S%G817>absence<s%> of the <S%G3793>multitude.<s%>
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G106>unleavened<s%> bread, <S%G1722>when<s%> <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3957>passover<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G2380>killed.<s%>
And he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G2036>saying,<s%> <S%G4198>Go<s%> and <S%G2090>prepare<s%> us the <S%G3957>passover,<s%> that we may eat. <S%G5315><s%>
And they <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G4226>Where<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> you that we <S%G2090>prepare?<s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> when you are <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city,<s%> there shall a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4876>meet<s%> you, <S%G941>bearing<s%> a <S%G2765>pitcher<s%> of <S%G5204>water;<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> him <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> he <S%G1531>enters<s%> in.

And you shall <S%G2046>say<s%> to the <S%G3611>manager<s%> of the <S%G3614>house,<s%> The <S%G1320>Master<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to you, <S%G4226>Where<s%> is the guest <S%G2646>room,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> I shall <S%G5315>eat<s%> the <S%G3957>passover<s%> with my disciples? <S%G3101><s%>
And he shall <S%G1166>show<s%> you a <S%G3173>large<s%> <S%G508>upper<s%> room <S%G4766>furnished:<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2090>make<s%> ready. <S%G2090><s%>
And they <S%G565>went,<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> as he had <S%G2046>said<s%> to them: and they <S%G2090>made<s%> <S%G2090>ready<s%> the <S%G3957>passover.<s%>
And <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G3588><s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> was <S%G1096>come,<s%> he <S%G377>sat<s%> <S%G377>down,<s%> and the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> with him.
And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, With <S%G1939>desire<s%> I have <S%G1937>desired<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3957>passover<s%> with you <S%G4253>before<s%> I suffer: <S%G3958><s%>

For I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, I will not <S%G3765>any<s%> <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%> thereof, <S%G1538><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> it be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And he <S%G1209>took<s%> the <S%G4221>cup,<s%> and gave <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2983>Take<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> and divide <S%G1266><s%> it among yourselves: <S%G1438><s%>

For I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, I will not <S%G4095>drink<s%> of the <S%G1081>fruit<s%> of the <S%G288>vine,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> shall come. <S%G2064><s%>

And he <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> and gave <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> and <S%G2806>broke<s%> it, and <S%G1325>gave<s%> to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5124>This<s%> is my <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> for you: <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> in <S%G364>remembrance<s%> of me.

<S%G5615>Likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1172>supper,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5124>This<s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> is the <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>testament<s%> in my <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1632>shed<s%> for you.
But, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of him that <S%G3860>betrays<s%> me is with me <S%G1909>on<s%> the table. <S%G5132><s%>

And <S%G3303>truly<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4198>goes,<s%> as it was <S%G3724>determined:<s%> but <S%G3759>woe<s%> to that <S%G444>man<s%> by <S%G3739>whom<s%> he is betrayed! <S%G3860><s%>
And they <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G4802>inquire<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> of them it was that <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G4238>do<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> thing.
And there was <S%G2532>also<s%> a <S%G5379>strife<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> them, <S%G5101>which<s%> of them should be <S%G1380>accounted<s%> the <S%G3187>greatest.<s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, The <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G2961>exercise<s%> <S%G2961>lordship<s%> over them; and they that <S%G1850>exercise<s%> <S%G1850>authority<s%> on them are <S%G2564>called<s%> benefactors. <S%G2110><s%>

But you shall not be <S%G3779>so:<s%> but he that is <S%G3187>greatest<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, let him be as the <S%G3501>younger;<s%> and he that is <S%G2233>chief,<s%> as he that does serve. <S%G1247><s%>

For whether <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G3187>greater,<s%> he that <S%G345>sits<s%> <S%G345>at<s%> meat, <S%G2228>or<s%> he that serves? <S%G1247><s%> is not he that <S%G345>sits<s%> <S%G345>at<s%> meat? but I <S%G1510>am<s%> among <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3319><s%> you as he that serves. <S%G1247><s%>
You are they which have <S%G1265>continued<s%> with me in my temptations. <S%G3986><s%>
And I <S%G1303>appoint<s%> to you a <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> as my <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G1303>appointed<s%> to me;

That you may <S%G2068>eat<s%> and <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> my <S%G5132>table<s%> in my <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> and <S%G2523>sit<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G2362>thrones<s%> <S%G2919>judging<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5443>tribes<s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

And the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> has desired <S%G1809><s%> to have you, that he may sift <S%G4617><s%> you as wheat: <S%G4621><s%>
But I have <S%G1189>prayed<s%> for you, that your <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1587>fail<s%> not: and <S%G4218>when<s%> you are <S%G1994>converted,<s%> <S%G4741>strengthen<s%> your brothers. <S%G80><s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> with you, <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison,<s%> and to <S%G2288>death.<s%>

And he <S%G3004>said,<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> the <S%G220>cock<s%> shall not <S%G5455>crow<s%> <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G4594>day,<s%> before <S%G4250><s%> <S%G2228><s%> that you shall <S%G5151>thrice<s%> <S%G533>deny<s%> that you <S%G1492>know<s%> me.

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G3753>When<s%> I <S%G649>sent<s%> you <S%G817>without<s%> <S%G905>purse,<s%> and <S%G4082>money,<s%> and <S%G5266>shoes,<s%> <S%G5302>lacked<s%> you <S%G5100>any<s%> thing? And they <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3762>Nothing.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> he to them, But <S%G3568>now,<s%> he that <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G905>purse,<s%> let him take <S%G142><s%> it, and likewise <S%G3668><s%> his <S%G4082>money:<s%> and he that <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3162>sword,<s%> let him <S%G4453>sell<s%> his <S%G2440>garment,<s%> and <S%G59>buy<s%> one.

For I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that <S%G5124>this<s%> that is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> be <S%G5055>accomplished<s%> in me, And he was <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> <S%G3326>among<s%> the <S%G459>transgressors:<s%> for the things <S%G4012>concerning<s%> me <S%G2192>have<s%> an end. <S%G5056><s%>
And they <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> are <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3162>swords.<s%> And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, It is enough. <S%G2425><s%>

And he <S%G1831>came<s%> out, and <S%G4198>went,<s%> as he was <S%G2596>wont,<s%> <S%G1485><s%> to the <S%G3735>mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives;<s%> and his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> him.
And when he was <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G5117>place,<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G4336>Pray<s%> that you <S%G1525>enter<s%> not <S%G1519>into<s%> temptation. <S%G3986><s%>
And he was <S%G645>withdrawn<s%> from them <S%G5616>about<s%> a <S%G3037>stone's<s%> <S%G1000>cast,<s%> and <S%G5087>kneeled<s%> <S%G1119><s%> down, and <S%G4336>prayed,<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you be <S%G1014>willing,<s%> <S%G3911>remove<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> from me: <S%G4133>nevertheless<s%> not my <S%G2307>will,<s%> but <S%G4674>yours,<s%> be done. <S%G1096><s%>
And there <S%G3700>appeared<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> to him from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G1765>strengthening<s%> him.

And <S%G1096>being<s%> in an <S%G74>agony<s%> he <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G1617>more<s%> <S%G1617>earnestly:<s%> and his <S%G2402>sweat<s%> was as it were great <S%G2361>drops<s%> of <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G2597>falling<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to the <S%G1093>ground.<s%>
And when he <S%G450>rose<s%> up from <S%G4335>prayer,<s%> and was <S%G2064>come<s%> to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> he <S%G2147>found<s%> them <S%G2837>sleeping<s%> for <S%G3077>sorrow,<s%>

And <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>Why<s%> <S%G2518>sleep<s%> you? <S%G450>rise<s%> and <S%G4336>pray,<s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> you <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> temptation. <S%G3986><s%>

And while he <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G2980>spoke,<s%> <S%G2400>behold<s%> a <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> and he that was <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2455>Judas,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> <S%G4281>went<s%> <S%G4281>before<s%> them, and drew <S%G1448>near<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to <S%G5368>kiss<s%> him.
But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G2455>Judas,<s%> <S%G3860>betray<s%> you the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> with a kiss? <S%G5370><s%>

When they which were <S%G4012>about<s%> him <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> would <S%G2071>follow,<s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> shall we <S%G3960>smite<s%> with the <S%G3162>sword?<s%>
And <S%G1520>one<s%> of them <S%G3960>smote<s%> the <S%G1401>servant<s%> of the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest,<s%> and <S%G851>cut<s%> <S%G851>off<s%> his <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G3775>ear.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1439>Suffer<s%> you <S%G5127>thus<s%> far. <S%G2193><s%> And he <S%G680>touched<s%> his <S%G5621>ear,<s%> and <S%G2390>healed<s%> him.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests,<s%> and <S%G4755>captains<s%> of the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> and the <S%G4245>elders,<s%> which were <S%G3854>come<s%> to him, Be you <S%G1831>come<s%> out, as <S%G1909>against<s%> a <S%G3027>thief,<s%> with <S%G3162>swords<s%> and staves? <S%G3586><s%>

When I was daily <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2250><s%> with you in the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> you <S%G1614>stretched<s%> <S%G1614>forth<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> me: but <S%G3778>this<s%> is <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> and the <S%G1849>power<s%> of darkness. <S%G4655><s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G4815>took<s%> they him, and <S%G71>led<s%> him, and <S%G1521>brought<s%> him <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest's<s%> <S%G3624>house.<s%> And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G3113>afar<s%> off.

And when they had <S%G681>kindled<s%> a <S%G4442>fire<s%> in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G833>hall,<s%> and were <S%G4776>set<s%> <S%G4776>down<s%> <S%G4776>together,<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G2521>down<s%> <S%G3319>among<s%> them.

But a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3814>maid<s%> <S%G1492>beheld<s%> him as he <S%G2521>sat<s%> by the <S%G5457>fire,<s%> and <S%G816>earnestly<s%> <S%G816>looked<s%> on him, and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> man was <S%G2532>also<s%> with him.
And he <S%G720>denied<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1135>Woman,<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> him not.

And <S%G3326>after<s%> a <S%G1024>little<s%> while <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> him, and <S%G5346>said,<s%> You <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of them. And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G444>Man,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not.

And <S%G5616>about<s%> the <S%G1339>space<s%> of <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> after <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G1340>confidently<s%> <S%G1340>affirmed,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Of a <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> fellow <S%G2532>also<s%> was with him: for he is a <S%G1057>Galilaean.<s%>

And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G444>Man,<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> not <S%G3739>what<s%> you <S%G3004>say.<s%> And <S%G3916>immediately,<s%> while he <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G2980>spoke,<s%> the <S%G220>cock<s%> <S%G5455>crew.<s%>

And the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4762>turned,<s%> and <S%G1689>looked<s%> on <S%G4074>Peter.<s%> And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G5279>remembered<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> he had <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G4250>Before<s%> the <S%G220>cock<s%> <S%G5455>crow,<s%> you shall <S%G533>deny<s%> me thrice. <S%G5151><s%>
And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out, and <S%G2799>wept<s%> <S%G4090>bitterly.<s%>
And the <S%G435>men<s%> that <S%G4912>held<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1702>mocked<s%> him, and <S%G1194>smote<s%> him.

And when they had <S%G4028>blindfolded<s%> him, they <S%G5180>struck<s%> him on the <S%G4383>face,<s%> and <S%G1905>asked<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4395>Prophesy,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> is it that <S%G3817>smote<s%> you?
